title: prANa nAyaka (j)
sahitya:
prANa nAyaka mAm pAhimat prANa nAyaka


anupallavi

  prINidAsha gOpayOSa pUrNa candra rasamAnana


caraNam 1    bimba sOdaram dEhi mE tAvakAdharam manda mRutOnu vAtIha candanAdrijAtO niratAm
    caraNam 2    madana mOhanAnga mE dayita kunjAti nikunjESu bhramatIndindirO nAtha 
    caraNam 3    nanda kumAraka pragAyAhi mE dayita kOmalAnga mannAyaka kAminI manOddIpaka
    caraNam 4    hEma supradIpa kahita pUrti dAyaka yAminIsha shaka lALita mAma vAsu gOkulArdhaka
